identity.name: Sangharsh Classes
identity.tagline: Building Strong Foundations for a Successful Future

usage.accent: font-family: 'Outfit', sans-serif; font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.05em; text-transform: uppercase;

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.whatsapp: fixed bottom-6 right-6 bg-[#25D366] text-white p-4 rounded-full shadow-lg hover:scale-110 transition-transform z-50 flex items-center justify-center

cards.course: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden group
cards.faculty: bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all text-center p-6
cards.testimonial: bg-slate-50 p-8 rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 relative

visual_enhancers.badges: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion' if not present.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' immediately.
3. TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors (primary: #1e40af, secondary: #15803d).
4. HERO SECTION: Use the 'hero_bg' image as a background with a white gradient overlay on the left side to ensure text readability. Do NOT center the text.
5. COURSES: Create a grid of cards. Each card should have a subtle top border (border-t-4) alternating between Primary Blue and Secondary Green.
6. GALLERY: Implement a simple masonry layout using the provided gallery images. Add a 'hover:scale-105' effect.
7. WHATSAPP: Add a fixed floating button at bottom-right with the WhatsApp logo (use react-icons/fa or an SVG).
8. CONTACT: Include a form with fields: Name, Class, Phone, Message. Use Shadcn Input/Textarea components.
9. FOOTER: Dark background (Slate 900) with white text. Include the address placeholder and contact links.
10. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for simple 'FadeInUp' effects on scroll for sections.
universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' font. Use 'Outfit' for headings and 'DM Sans' for body.
Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Ensure high contrast for text. No gray-on-gray.
